name: Brute_Mace_Mastery
display_help: Black Scorpion has granted you access to the advanced technology of the Executioner's Mace. The signature weapon of the Bane Spider Executioner, it is not a typical clumsy mace. The Executioner's Mace is capable of firing a variety of energy projectiles and grenades. It can even be modified to summon and command some or Black Scorpion's RV technologies.
power_short_helps: Toggle: Self +To Hit, +ACC, +Perception, Res(DeBuff To Hit)
Ranged (Targeted AoE), Light DMG(Energy), Foe Knockback
